title: JavaOne 2025: Talks, History, Community, and Scott McNealy
author: David Cassel
description: After a two-year hiatus, Oracle's JavaOne conference returned to Redwood Shores to celebrate 30 years of Java and the release of Java 24, featuring historical insights from Sun Microsystems co-founder Scott McNealy.
cndescription: 在中断两年后，Oracle 的 JavaOne 大会重返红木海岸，庆祝 Java 诞生 30 周年和 Java 24 的发布，其中 Sun Microsystems 联合创始人 Scott McNealy 分享了历史见解。
